TopicTitle: Forum feature highlight: the reputation system

Articles.Content: How many people do I have to spread rep around before I can rep the same again?
I would never stop giving rep. Cause I think rep is how many people are kind enough to give you rep

How many people do I have to spread rep around before I can rep the same again?

Unfortantly Rep is not ernt by Reping others, that would be a silly system

How many people do I have to spread rep around before I can rep the same again?

10.

Unfortantly Rep is not ernt by Reping others, that would be a silly system

He was asking how many people he had to rep before the "You must spread some reputation around before giving it to this user again!" message would go away for a user he wants to give more rep to.
You can rep a maximum of 10 times per 24 hours. You only have to spread it around to a few users (3 or 4 IIRC) before being able to rep the same person again.

You can rep a maximum of 10 times per 24 hours. You only have to spread it around to a few users (3 or 4 IIRC) before being able to rep the same person again.

Wait really? I thought for sure it was 10 for the same user. Hmm. (Plus I tried giving rep to someone after 8 others and it still said I had to spread some..)

Wait really? I thought for sure it was 10 for the same user. Hmm. (Plus I tried giving rep to someone after 8 others and it still said I had to spread some..)

Have to ask a forum admin about that, though Red Iron Crown has the most rep it doesn't mean he knows everything about the system. I think it's closer to six personally though I don't hand out rep like candy.

Have to ask a forum admin about that, though Red Iron Crown has the most rep it doesn't mean he knows everything about the system. I think it's closer to six personally though I don't hand out rep like candy.

I believe the correct answer is five. Or another way of seeing it: if you look in your 'settings' window it will display the last five posts/people to whom you have given rep. You cannot give any of those people rep again, but I believe you can give it to anyone else (unless you have hit the 24 hour limit)

And I guess I do hand out rep like I hand out candy (Halloween excepted): as a treat to make people happy, but only at appropriate times and for appropriate behaviors, and never so much that it will make someone sick
Oh.... OK... I was confused, I thought I got my next bar at 200, but it's not until 250. No wonder I'm still drawing blueprints... lol..

Oh.... OK... I was confused, I thought I got my next bar at 200, but it's not until 250. No wonder I'm still drawing blueprints... lol..

Actually you do get a third bar at 200. It's every 100 points until you get to 500. After that it's every 200 points.

Actually you do get a third bar at 200. It's every 100 points until you get to 500. After that it's every 200 points.

Oh I see, I didn't read the OP close enough... the bar thing is in hundreds, but the mouse-over comment isn't... confusion solved, thank!
Reputation earnings are rare for me. I don't really do notable stuff very often. Oh well

Let's look back upon this. 

 

 

No more "rep" only Facebook knockoff likes.
Oh yeah. Something else we need to update. :/
